name: Introduction to Economics
description: A survey of the fundamental principles of economics, including microeconomic and macroeconomic analysis.

name: Intermediate Microeconomics
description: A study of Microeconomic theory and its application to markets, including consumer demand theory, production and cost theory, and market structure.

name: Advanced Microeconomics
description: Advanced microeconomic analysis, including topics such as game theory, general equilibrium models, and welfare economics.
